title: About SeaNeB
subtitle: Building trusted local discovery for real estate
intro: SeaNeB helps buyers, renters, and brokers discover verified properties and connect faster with the right opportunities.

featureCards.title: Verification Layer
featureCards.description: We prioritize listing quality checks so users can evaluate properties with higher confidence.

featureCards.title: Location First Discovery
featureCards.description: Country, state, city, and area pages make local discovery fast and structured.

featureCards.title: Direct Business Connect
featureCards.description: Users can reach brokers and businesses directly from listing detail pages.

process: Search by location and property type.
Review verified listing details and business profile context.

sections.heading: Who We Serve
items: Property seekers looking for verified options in their city.
Owners and brokers who want qualified leads and better visibility.
Teams that need clean workflows for listings and follow-ups.

sections.heading: Our Story
items: SeaNeB started with a simple idea: local property discovery should be transparent and quick.
We are focused on reducing search friction and improving trust through better listing quality.
Our platform continues to evolve with practical tools for both consumers and businesses.

faq.question: What makes SeaNeB different?
faq.answer: We focus on verified listing quality, clear information, and a smoother local search experience.

faq.question: Can businesses join SeaNeB?
faq.answer: Yes. Owners and brokers can list properties, manage visibility, and connect with genuine inquiries.

title: SeaNeB Solutions
subtitle: Practical tools for buyers, renters, and property businesses
intro: From local discovery to business growth, SeaNeB provides a focused set of features for real estate operations.

featureCards.title: Buyer Search Stack
featureCards.description: Smart location flow for faster property shortlisting.

featureCards.title: Business Listing Control
featureCards.description: Manage listings, details, and visibility from one dashboard.

featureCards.title: Analytics Ready
featureCards.description: Track listing activity and optimize conversion quality over time.

featureCards.title: Partner Onboarding
featureCards.description: Structured onboarding flow for agencies and brokers.

process: Set up profile and service areas.
Publish verified listings with clear details.
Capture intent and respond faster to qualified leads.
Track outcomes and improve listing strategy.

sections.heading: For Property Seekers
items: Browse city, state, and area pages with structured listing information.
Compare options quickly with clear property details.
Reach out to businesses directly from listing pages.

sections.heading: For Property Businesses
items: Manage business identity and listing presence.
Use dashboard workflows to organize listings and responses.
Increase local discoverability with location-first pages.

faq.question: Do you support multiple regions?
faq.answer: Yes. SeaNeB is designed for region-first growth and can scale by country, state, and city.

faq.question: Is there a partner program?
faq.answer: Yes. Teams can collaborate through our partner onboarding flow.

title: News and Blogs
subtitle: Updates, guides, and market insights
intro: Read practical content that helps users make better property decisions and helps businesses grow responsibly.

featureCards.title: Buyer Playbooks
featureCards.description: Step-by-step guides for home buying and renting decisions.

featureCards.title: Local Trends
featureCards.description: Area-level updates on pricing, demand, and supply changes.

featureCards.title: Business Growth Content
featureCards.description: Operational tips for agencies and brokers to improve outcomes.

featuredPosts.title: How to Evaluate Property Listings Before a Site Visit
featuredPosts.description: A practical checklist for comparing options and avoiding noisy listings.

featuredPosts.title: City Growth Signals Every Buyer Should Track
featuredPosts.description: Use locality infrastructure and demand indicators to decide better.

featuredPosts.title: Broker Playbook: Improve Lead Quality in 30 Days
featuredPosts.description: Simple changes in profile and listing setup that drive better inquiry quality.

sections.heading: What You Will Find
items: Buying and renting checklists.
Local market updates and trends.
Business playbooks for brokers and property owners.

sections.heading: Publishing Focus
items: Actionable content over generic advice.
Clear explanations for first-time seekers.
Regular updates aligned with platform changes.

faq.question: How often are posts published?
faq.answer: We publish updates as new platform features and local insights become available.

faq.question: Can I contribute a guest post?
faq.answer: Yes. Partner teams can contact us for editorial collaboration opportunities.

title: Partner With SeaNeB
subtitle: Grow your real estate business with better local visibility
intro: Join SeaNeB to get discovered by serious property seekers and strengthen your brand in your service area.

featureCards.title: Business Profile Visibility
featureCards.description: Appear in local discovery pages where users are actively searching.

featureCards.title: Listing Quality Tools
featureCards.description: Improve trust with complete listing details and structured information.

featureCards.title: Support and Guidance
featureCards.description: Get help with onboarding, listing setup, and performance optimization.

process: Track and improve your lead pipeline.

sections.heading: Why Partner
items: Reach local audiences already searching for properties.
Showcase your business profile and services.
Build trust through a consistent digital presence.

sections.heading: How It Works
items: Create your business profile and complete verification steps.
Add or optimize listings with clean details.
Track responses and improve conversion quality over time.

faq.question: Who can apply as a partner?
faq.answer: Brokers, agencies, builders, and property service teams can apply.

faq.question: How fast is onboarding?
faq.answer: Most profiles can start quickly once required business information is submitted.

title: Contact SeaNeB
subtitle: Talk to our team
intro: Need help with listings, onboarding, or product support? Reach out and we will guide you.

contactChannels.title: Support

featureCards.description: Find quick answers for common product and account questions.

featureCards.title: Partner Support
featureCards.description: Get setup guidance for onboarding and listing optimization.

featureCards.title: Product Feedback
featureCards.description: Share feature ideas that can improve search and business workflows.

sections.heading: Get In Touch
items: Sales support for partnership and growth conversations.
Product support for account and dashboard queries.
General assistance for platform feedback and requests.

sections.heading: Response Expectations
items: Share complete context to speed up resolution.
Include your profile or listing details if applicable.
Our team prioritizes requests based on impact and urgency.

faq.question: Where should I request technical help?
faq.answer: Use the Help Center first, then contact support if you need direct assistance.

faq.question: Can I request a sales demo?
faq.answer: Yes. Use the partner or sales contact flow and our team will follow up.
